project.description:
After running this build the Microservice Production Node should be running. You can check the Version with the following urls:

  • Catalog Frontend Version
  • Cart Microservice Manifest
  • Product Microservice Manifest
  • Navigation Microservice Manifest

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: for HOST in $PROD_SERVERS; do ssh ubuntu@$HOST -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -v <<EOF sudo su apt-get update ROLE_FLAG_FILE=/etc/server_role SERVER_ROLE=production if [ ! -f \$ROLE_FLAG_FILE ] then echo "\$SERVER_ROLE" > \$ROLE_FLAG_FILE else ROLE="\$(cat \$ROLE_FLAG_FILE)" if [ "\$ROLE" != "\$SERVER_ROLE" ] then echo "Deployment ERROR! Mismatch between deployment role and the server role. This system is tagged '\$ROLE' and you are trying to deploy as '\$SERVER_ROLE'." exit 1 fi fi echo "Deploying to \$SERVER_ROLE server..." echo **************************************** echo * Remove Application * echo **************************************** apt-get clean dpkg --remove --force-all shop-registration-frontend dpkg --remove --force-all shop-catalog-frontend dpkg --remove --force-all shop-checkout-frontend dpkg --remove --force-all shop-product-service dpkg --remove --force-all shop-navigation-service dpkg --remove --force-all shop-cart-service echo **************************************** echo * Install Application * echo **************************************** apt-get -y install dialog apt-utils apt-get -y install shop-registration-frontend apt-get -y install shop-catalog-frontend apt-get -y install shop-checkout-frontend apt-get -y install shop-product-service apt-get -y install shop-navigation-service apt-get -y install shop-cart-service EOF done
